# Incident Severity and Organizational Response

Incident severity represents the perceived
impact and urgency of an operational issue.

## What Severity Influences
- Escalation and paging behavior
- Leadership visibility
- Customer and stakeholder communication
- Allocation of engineering resources

## Why Teams Consider AI Assistance
- Faster assessment during chaotic incidents
- Reduction of subjective judgment
- Consistency across responders

## Known Operational Risks
- Incorrect severity downgrades masking real impact
- Delayed escalation due to false confidence
- Loss of trust in incident handling
- Unclear responsibility for severity changes

This document provides context only.
It does not define acceptable severity boundaries.
